Bane (C1 [Soldier Legate Domain] Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]

Cloudkill (C5 [Keeper Of Obsidian Domain] Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (Constitution half) and moves away 10'/rd for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (C5 [Soldier Legate Domain] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (C4 [Witch Taker Domain] Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack an adjacent creature/20% act normally (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level increases radius by 5']
Contagion (C5 [Keeper Of Obsidian Domain] Necr): Touched becomes diseased for 7 dy after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes neg)
Counterspell (C3 [Witch Taker Domain] Abju): R60' Negates foe casting up to spell level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level negates a higher-level spell [+Level negates any spell of equal or lesser level]
Darkvision (C2 [Soldier Legate Domain] Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr

Detect Magic (C1 [Witch Taker Domain] Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc up to 10 min [R]
Detect Thoughts (C2 [Witch Taker Domain] Divi): R30' Self senses target surface thoughts and may probe deeper (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min

Dominate Person (C5 [Witch Taker Domain] Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wisdom neg; damage yields another save) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to 10 min/1 hr/8 hr at level 6/7/8]
Freedom Of Movement (C4 [Witch Taker Domain] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments for 1 hr

Hellish Rebuke (C1 [Soldier Legate Domain] Evoc): R60' May cast as a Reaction to inflict 2d10 HP fire on a successful attacker (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]

Regenerate (C7 [Soldier Legate Domain] Tran): Touched regains 4d8+15 HP and 1 HP/rd for 1 hr and reattaches or regrows severed parts

See Invisibility (C2 [Keeper Of Obsidian Domain] Divi): Self sees invisible and ethereal items for 1 hr
Stoneskin (C4 [Soldier Legate Domain] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc up to 1 hr
Vampiric Touch (C3 [Soldier Legate Domain] Necr): Touched suffers 3d6 HP and self regains half for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
